nodes.text: A female individual served as deputy minister of trade for the Imperial Remnant in 43 ABY, and was responsible for perishable goods. That year, she was stationed at the Galactic Empire Embassy on the planet Coruscant. On one occasion, she was entertaining a guest in one of the embassy's rooms, when a blaster shot breached the floor of the apartment and hit her in the foot, causing her to scream and curse.

The shot had been fired from the quarters below by Imperial Head of State Jagged Fel, who was fending off a kidnapping attempt and was trying to trigger the building's alarm. The shots did attract help, and the attempted kidnapping failed as a result.
This deputy minister of trade was first mentioned in the 2009 novel Fate of the Jedi: Backlash, the fourth book in the Fate of the Jedi series, written by Aaron Allston.
